mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY notice_id) AS R_NUM, B.* FROM (SELECT * FROM notice) B ) C ORDER BY R_NUM DESC
mapper.sql: SELECT notice_id, notice_title, notice_con, notice_date FROM notice
mapper.select: ORDER BY notice_date DESC, notice_id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT notice_id, notice_title, notice_con, notice_date FROM notice WHERE TRUE AND notice_title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY notice_date DESC, notice_id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM notice WHERE TRUE AND notice_title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
